para.sentence: \lambda\left(\tau\right)=16\left(\frac{{\eta^{2}}\left(2\tau\right)\eta\left( \tfrac{1}{2}\tau\right)}{{\eta^{3}}\left(\tau\right)}\right)^{8}, J\left(\tau\right)=\frac{4}{27}\frac{\left(1-\lambda\left(\tau\right)+{\lambda ^{2}}\left(\tau\right)\right)^{3}}{\left(\lambda\left(\tau\right)\left(1- \lambda\left(\tau\right)\right)\right)^{2}}, J\left(\tau\right)=\frac{{g_{2}^{3}}}{{g_{2}^{3}}-27{g_{3}^{2}}}, where g_{2},g_{3} are the invariants of the lattice \mathbb{L} with generators 1 and \tau ; see ยง23.3(i).
